text: (noyeleul) guhaji moshan janeun geu dul-i seolo mom-eul jeobchoghagi jeon-e du dal yeonsog-ui dansig(i uimu)ila. (dansig-ui) neunglyeog-eul gajchuji moshan janeun yugsib myeong-ui bul-uhan jaleul meog-im(i uimu)ila. igeos-eun geudaedeul-i hananimgwa geubun-ui sadoleul (jinjeong-eulo) midgi wiham-ila. igeos-eun hananim-ui gyeong-gyela. geuligo bulsinjadeul-egeneun gotongseuleon beol-i iss-eul geos-ila
